question: Which country houses the headquarters of the luxury fashion and perfume house "Givenchy"?
explanation: The headquarters of the luxury fashion and perfume house "Givenchy" is located in Paris, the capital city of France. Givenchy is a French luxury fashion and perfume house. It hosts the brand of haute couture clothing, accessories and Parfums Givenchy, perfumes and cosmetics. The house of Givenchy was founded in 1952 by designer Hubert de Givenchy and is a member of Chambre Syndicale de la Haute Couture et du Pret-a-Porter. It is owned by a luxury conglomerate LVMH.
